name: ps1
long_description:
Description
===========

Prepends a string to the user's PS1 in their .bashrc

Recipes
=======

default
-------

Simply prepends the content of `['ps1']['prepend']` to `PS1` at the end of the `.bashrc` to each of the `['ps1']['users']`.

    export PS1="#{node['ps1']['prepend']}$PS1"
